name: slack-shot
description: a tool to quickly nab a screenshot of a website

USERNAME.description: Optional: Username to use when replying with the conversion result (default: slackshot)

EMOJI.description: Optional: Emoji icon to use when replying with the conversion result (default: :round_pushpin:)

SLACK_TOKEN.description: Optional: Additional security step: Slack slash command token for verification that the request came from your Slack team
